title: 94/749/EC: Council Decision of 10 November 1994 appointing a member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 10 November 1994 appointing a member of the Committee of the Regions (94/749/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 198a thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 26 January 1994 appointing the members of the Committee of the Regions for the period 26 January 1994 to 25 January 1998 (1),
Whereas a member's seat has become vacant on the Committee of the Regions following the resignation of Mr Christoph Bergner, notified to the Council on 8 November 1994;
Having regard to the proposal from the German Government,
main_body: Mr Juergen Gramke is hereby appointed a member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Mr Christoph Bergner for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which runs until 25 January 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 November 1994.
For the Council
The President
U. SEILER-ALBRING
(1) OJ No L 31, 4. 2. 1994, p. 29.
